{{wikipedia|lang=zh}}

===Etymology===
Attestable in ancient Chinese texts. For the sense of "insurance", re{{bor|zh|ja|-|nocap=1}} {{ja-r|保險|ほけん}}.

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[assure]]; to [[guarantee]]
#: {{zh-x|我 敢 '''保險''' 這 是 世界 新 紀錄。|I can '''assure''' you that this is the new world record.}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to be [[bound]] to; to be [[sure]] to
#: {{zh-x|照 我 說 的 做，'''保險''' 沒事。|Do as I say and '''I am sure''' you are fine.}}
# {{label|zh|literary}} to [[guard]] a [[strategic]] place; to [[defend]] a strategic pass

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[safe]]; [[secure]]
#: {{zh-x|天氣 忽冷忽熱，多 穿 點 '''保險'''！|The weather is quite variable; please wear a bit more just '''to be safe'''!}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[safety]] {{gloss|mechanical device on a firearm}}
# [[insurance]]; [[indemnity]] {{gloss|equitable transfer of the risk of a loss, from one entity to another in exchange for payment}}
#: {{zh-x|保險 額|'''insurance''' coverage}}
#: {{zh-x|你 的 車 上 '''保險''' 了 嗎？|Is your car insured?}}
